00026 typedef enum UA_ConnectionState {
00027     UA_CONNECTION_OPENING, 
00028     UA_CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, 
00029     UA_CONNECTION_CLOSED, 
00030 } UA_ConnectionState;
00031 
00032 typedef struct UA_ConnectionConfig {
00033     UA_UInt32 protocolVersion;
00034     UA_UInt32 sendBufferSize;
00035     UA_UInt32 recvBufferSize;
00036     UA_UInt32 maxMessageSize;
00037     UA_UInt32 maxChunkCount;
00038 } UA_ConnectionConfig;
00039 
00040 extern const UA_EXPORT UA_ConnectionConfig UA_ConnectionConfig_standard;

00042 /* Forward declaration */
00043 struct UA_SecureChannel;
00044 typedef struct UA_SecureChannel UA_SecureChannel;
00045 
00051 struct UA_Connection {
00052     UA_ConnectionState state;
00053     UA_ConnectionConfig localConf;
00054     UA_ConnectionConfig remoteConf;
00055     UA_SecureChannel *channel; 
00056     UA_Int32 sockfd; 
00057 
00058     void *handle; 
00059     UA_ByteString incompleteMessage; 
00060 
00062     UA_StatusCode (*getSendBuffer)(UA_Connection *connection, UA_Int32 length, UA_ByteString *buf);
00063 
00065     void (*releaseSendBuffer)(UA_Connection *connection, UA_ByteString *buf);
00066 
00073     UA_StatusCode (*send)(UA_Connection *connection, UA_ByteString *buf);
00074 
00085     UA_StatusCode (*recv)(UA_Connection *connection, UA_ByteString *response, UA_UInt32 timeout);
00086 
00088     void (*releaseRecvBuffer)(UA_Connection *connection, UA_ByteString *buf);
00089 
00091     void (*close)(UA_Connection *connection);
00092 };
